tika-vin08t12:8_12: He should apply himself to the Buddha, thinking, “Take the discourses;”

tika-vin08t12:8_6: But Pilindavaccha has been allocated ascetics that they did not eat, nor too much time of laypeople.
tika-vin08t12:8_7: It should be seen that the field, then, because of the ear, the neck, the wight should be seen, heard, thought, and known by the Sangha.

tika-vin08t12:9_0: and robe funds have been set aside.
tika-vin08t12:9_3: This is the consequence for a monk so-and-so.
